## About NHSquicker
:::
<section id="features" class="features">
  <div class="feature">
   <p> 
   NHSquicker is a <strong>free app</strong> providing <strong>live wait times</strong> for NHS services in <strong>Devon, Cornwall and Somerset</strong>. 
      It was created to help people make <strong>smarter healthcare choices</strong> and reduce unnecessary pressure on the NHS.
    </p>
  </div>
</section>






### Why it matters

A&E waiting times have increased substantially over recent years, leading to longer waits and increased strain on emergency services.

High volumes of patients attending A&E can lead to over-crowding, rising pressure on A&E services and poorer experience for patients.





NHSquicker enables **faster, smarter healthcare choices** for people, while helping the NHS run more efficiently.
